name: Quasi-Rothko
description: In 2005 I took a series of photos in very low light with long (several-second) exposures, primarily of brightly-colored items in my friend's apartment downtown Chicago. I punched up the contrast and exposure a bit in post. These abstract expressionist photo "paintings" were my favorite of the set. I like that this one reminds me of one of my favorite painters: Rothko.
